text: Yasser Harrak is a Canadian writer, commentator and founder of the Middle East Seminar forum. He has written dozens of peer reviewed articles in Arabic published by Almothaqaf Political Daily and Annabaa Institution for Media and Culture, in addition to a book titled: The Predicators, and another titled: Shiaphobia and the Iranianization of Shiism, both published in Arabic.UnpublishedOttawa 2016, "Yasser Harrak" http://unpublishedottawa.com/users/yasser-harrak In 2016, Yasser Harrak appeared in the Oximity News list of selected writers joining some of the world's most respected authors and human rights activists like Noam Chomsky and Robert Reich.Oximity 2016, "Selected Writers". https://www.oximity.com/selected/authors/people He wrote and edited articles on Middle Eastern culture, security issues and current affairs for Oximity until its acquisition by reading subscription service Scribd in November 2016.Scribd 2016, Scribd Acquires Oximity to Streamline Content Publishing and Distribution, http://blog.scribd.com/2016/11/14/scribd-acquires-oximity-to- streamline-content-publishing-and-distribution/ The author is also listed as top contributor to Unpublished Ottawa, Canada's only social media website dedicated to current affairs.Unpublished Ottawa 2016, Top Contributors List "Yasser Harrak" http://unpublishedottawa.com/contributors In a study published by the Center of Studies for Arab Unity, Dr. Abdelatif Hannachi cited Harrak'a article "Salafi Revisionism" in his research on Islamic movements in the Arab world.Aljazeera. Retrieved at https://unpublishedottawa.com/users/yasser-harrak == Minority Rights Star == In 2013, the largest newspaper in Morocco, Almassae, named Yasser Harrak a minority star citing his work in support of the freedom of religion in the kingdom. His literature generally promotes secularism and the separation between faith and state.Almassae 2013. "The Stars of Religious Minorities in Morocco. Maghress February 2, 2013. http://www.maghress.com/almassae/173801 Yasser Harrak was listed with two other influential activists: televangelist Brother Rachid and the most influential Moroccan atheist Qasim al Ghazali.Almassae 2013. Coverpage. https://issuu.com/almassae/docs/1984_09_02_2013 == Counter Extremism Efforts == Yasser Harrak at Laval University. Quebec 2013 Harrak's anti-extremism literature has been translated from English and Arabic, his writing languages, to several other languages. The Italian magazine Ilguastatore translated to Italian and published his article "Understanding why Saudi State Clerics Offer Prayers for ISIS".Ilguastatore. "Arabia Saudita: il video shock in cui il clero di Stato prega per l'Isis" 17 dicembre 2015. http://www.ilguastatore.it/arabia-saudita-il-video-shock-in-cui-il-clero-di- stato-prega-per-lisis/ The author has been known for openly criticizing political Islam and its prominent figures. He often publishes articles exposing radical scholars and activists calling on Canadian politicians to ban them from entering the country. In 2015, Badil Info, a famed Moroccan news agency, qualified Harrak's activism as a form of lobbying.Badil Info 2015. "Shi'ites Accuse Moroccan Officials of Nazism".Badil. January 5, 2015. http://badil.info/%D8%B4%D9%8A%D8%B9%D8%A9-%D9%8A%D8%B5%D9%81%D9%88%D9%86-%D8%A8%D8%B1%D9%84%D9%85%D8%A7%D9%86%D9%8A%D9%8A%D9%86-%D9%85%D8%BA%D8%A7%D8%B1%D8%A8%D8%A9-%D8%A8%D9%80-%D8%A7%D9%84%D9%86%D8%A7%D8%B2%D9%8A/ In an interview with the London-based Fadak TV, Harrak suggested that the only way to trounce modern extremism is to denounce extreme acts of violence committed by the Muslim Caliphs. Violence, according to him, cannot be denounced in the present and glorified in the past.Understanding Why ISIS Burns People Alive. Youtube. December 24, 2015. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BTc2KwANKX0 In August 2015, Chouf TV reported that Harrak campaigned to have Sheikh Abdel-Bari Zamzami expelled from Canada in the start of his 6 months visit to his daughter. He published articles accusing Zamzami of being anti-Semitic preaching hatred against Jews and Shiites. He also accused him of using Canadian health system urging prime minister Stephen Harper to expel him from Canada.Chouf TV. He accused al-Arefe of planning to recruit Moroccan youth to join radical movements fighting in Syria. Several news outlets published Harrak's article including Al Etejah TV.Al Etejah TV. Retrieved August 27, 2016. http://www.alalam.ir/news/1747962 ==Canadian Politics== During the 2015 electoral campaign in Canada, Harrak published several articles criticizing the conservative party in the way it handled domestic and international issues. He urged Canadians in general and minorities in specific to vote for the Liberals through the Ottawa-based Support Trudeau campaign,Support Justin Trudeau For Prime Minister Of Canada.
